title: Emerald Bloom Kangan - A Touch of Tradition
materials: Hand-selected Sparkling Diamonds (Vajralu). Features Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: Intricately crafted openwork design, blending traditional Indian floral motifs with modern geometric patterns. The central emerald is set in a secure bezel setting (pakka setting) and is surrounded by a halo of diamonds. The repeating diamond motif throughout the bracelet adds a touch of elegance and the band has a hinge with a pressure clasp for easy and secure wear.
colors: Rich yellow gold with a vibrant green emerald centerpiece and brilliant white diamonds
creating a harmonious and auspicious color combination.
occasions: and celebratory events. A statement piece for traditional attire like sarees and lehengas
and a unique addition to modern formal wear.
description: This Kangan embodies the timeless elegance of South Indian jewelry. The high-quality materials and meticulous craftsmanship ensure a lasting treasure. The emerald is a symbol of prosperity and the diamonds are symbols of strength and purity. This piece is designed for comfort and durability, and is a guaranteed conversation starter.
